extension.description:
To support game audio file used by some Nintendo DS games.
Dual Screen Sound Format is an audio format based on PSF. It stores audio ripped from the ROMs of Nintendo DS games. Music instructions are stored in files with a .2sflib extension and the music notation is stored in files with a .mini2sf extension.
ASAP (Another Slight Atari Player) plays on Kodi and converts 8-bit Atari music (*.sap, *.cmc, *.mpt, *.rmt, *.tmc, ...) on modern computers and mobile devices.

DUMB is a module audio renderer library. It reads module files and outputs audio that can be dumped to the actual audio playback library.
On Kodi Supports playback of the following module formats: - IT (Impulse Tracker) - XM (Fasttracker II) - S3M (Scream Tracker 3)

Game Music Emu (GME) format is used to emulate the audio output of various video game consoles popular in the 1980s and 1990s. It gives a "retro" feel to the sound.
Suppoted Formats: - AY: ZX Spectrum/Amstrad CPC - GBS: Nintendo Game Boy - GYM: Sega Genesis/Mega Drive - HES: NEC TurboGrafx-16/PC Engine - KSS: MSX Home Computer/other Z80 systems (no FM sound) - NSF/NSFE: Nintendo NES/Famicom (with VRC 6, Namco 106, and FME-7 sound) - SAP: Atari systems using POKEY sound chip - SPC: Super Nintendo/Super Famicom - VGM/VGZ: Sega Master System/Mark III, Sega Genesis/Mega Drive,BBC Micro

GSF is a addon for Kodi which adds the ability to play Game Boy Advance music files, the GSF format (MINIGSF and GSFLIB files). This player is based on the Visual Boy Advanced emulator, although the sound quality appears to be identical to Highly Advanced.

Plays MOD files and few other formats.
It is recommended to use "OpenMPT Audio Decoder" addon instead of this one.

extension.summary: NCSF (Nitro Composer Sound Format) Audio Decoder
extension.description:
Adds decoding support for Nitro Composer Sound Format files (.NCSF/.MININCSF).
Nitro Composer Sound Format (NCSF) is a PSF-style for Nintendo DS music, specifically music that was created via Nitro Composer, a tracker-like composer that is part of Nintendo's Nitro SDK for the Nintendo DS.

The Nintendo Sound Format (NSF) is a container format, that holds audio code ripped from the ROMs of games for the Nintendo Entertainment System. The NES had a pretty good sound engine for its time supporting 2 pulse-waves, 1 triangle wave, a noise channel, and DPCM channel which is a raw 7-bit counter raw sample playback.

OpenMPT (short hand for Open ModPlug Tracker) is completely free and his library allows you play back some great music on your Kodi.
It supports loading of IT (Impulse Tracker), XM (FastTracker Extended Module), MOD (ProTracker and similar), S3M (Scream Tracker 3) and MPTM (its own file format) files, imports many more module and sample file formats.
See his website for complete list of supported types.

Organya is a music format used in "Cave Story", created by the Japanese programmer "Pixel". As well as being used in the original game, there is a large and active Cave Story fan community which creates music in this format, both for standalone to play and for use in mods for the game.
This addon allows playing of .ORG files for this format.

Adds decoding support for Capcom QSound Sound Format files (.QSF/.MINIQSF).
QSound is the original name for a positional three-dimensional (3D) sound processing algorithm from QSound Labs that creates 3D audio effects from multiple monophonic sources and sums the outputs to two channels for presentation over regular stereo speakers.

Sound Interface Device (SID) is a format that houses Commodore 64 and 128 music.
This is a addon that implements the emulation of the C64's SID chip (MOS 6581) and CPU (6510) by .SID or .SIDSTREAM files.

The SPC format holds Super Nintendo (SNES) game music. It is named after Sony's SPC700 contribution to the SNES's S-SMP audio chip. The SNES was a major jump in audio technology from the NES allowing for stereo sound, more channels, and fully sampled instruments.
Sega Saturn Sound Format (SSF) and Dreamcast Sound Format (DSF) is an audio format based on PSF. It stores audio ripped from the ROMs of Sega Saturn and Sega Dreamcast games.

YM (YM2149 Music) is an audio format that logs instructions sent to an AY-3-8910 or YM2149 chip. Playback occurs by emulating the chips and sending the logged data to them. Because the format merely logs the instructions to the chip, it doesn't preserve the original content of the music format.

TiMidity is a software synthesizer that can play MIDI files without a hardware synthesizer.
To use TiMidity you need a working timidity.cfg config file or sound fonts. Copy this files into the directory you intend to store and select it in the Add-on Settings.
Adds decoding support for Sony Playstation Sound Format files (.PSF/.MINIPSF).

extension.summary: USF - Nintendo Ultra 64 Sound Format Decoder
extension.description: This is a decoder which adds support for playing (Ultra) Nintendo 64 Sound format (.USF/.MINIUSF) files.
Video Game Music (VGM) Audio Decoder is a library for playing a wide variety of audio formats used in video games.

WonderSwan R (WSR) is a container format, that holds audio code ripped from the ROMs of games for the WonderSwan and WonderSwan Color handheld game system. Both the original and color versions used the same audio chip which could handle 4 PCM audio channels.

FLAC stands for Free Lossless Audio Codec, an audio format similar to MP3, but lossless, meaning that audio is compressed in FLAC without any loss in quality. This is similar to how Zip works, except with FLAC you will get much better compression because it is designed specifically for audio, and you can play back compressed FLAC files in your favorite player (or your car or home stereo, see supported devices) just like you would an MP3 file.
FLAC stands out as the fastest and most widely supported lossless audio codec, and the only one that at once is non-proprietary, is unencumbered by patents, has an open-source reference implementation, has a well documented format and API, and has several other independent implementations.

extension.summary: LAME is a high quality MPEG Audio Layer III (MP3)
extension.description: It use LAME, the high quality MPEG Audio Layer III (MP3) encoder licensed under the LGPL.
Vorbis is a general purpose perceptual audio CODEC intended to allow maximum encoder flexibility, thus allowing it to scale competitively over an exceptionally wide range of bitrates.
WAV (Waveform Audio Format) is an uncompressed sound format.

extension.description:
Provides an easy way to browse and view movie and TV show extras. Extras can be accessed from the context menu in the video library.
By default, the add-on will look in the "Extras" sub-folder for content (can be changed in settings).
Tip: for how to avoid extras beings scraped to library, see http://kodi.wiki/view/Add-on:Extras
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007

extension.description:
High Efficiency Image File Format (HEIF) is a file format employing HEVC (h.265) image coding for the best compression ratios currently possible.
Support for this is provided by ISO/IEC 23008-12:2017 compliant libheif.
libmpo based image decoder
libraw based image decoder
InputStream client for adaptive streams

extension.description:
InputStream Client for streams that can be opened by FFmpeg's libavformat such as plain TS, HLS and DASH (without DRM) streams.
The addon also has support for Archive/Catchup services where there is a replay windows (usually in days) and can timeshift across that span.
For documenation visit: https://github.com/xbmc/inputstream.ffmpegdirect/blob/Matrix/README.md

extension.description:
The Real Time Messaging Protocol (RTMP) is a proprietary network protocol developed by Adobe Inc. to transmit audio, video and other data over the Internet from a media server to a flash player.
This addon implements RTMP streaming support for Kodi and installed add-ons.

extension.description:
Hierdie skraper kollekteer inligting vanaf die volgende ondersteunde werwe: MusicBrainz, last.fm, allmusic.com en amazon.de, terwyl kunswerke gegryp word vanaf: fanart.tv, last.fm en allmusic.com. Dit kan veld vir veld gestel word vanaf watter werf jy die spesifieke inligting wil h.
Die aanvaklike soektog word altyd op MusicBrainz gedoen. Ingeval skakels van allmusic en/of amazon.de nie bygevoeg is op die MusicBrainz werf, kan velde vanaf allmusic.com en/of amazon.de nie gaan haal word nie (egter baie maklik om daardie ontbrekende skakels by te voeg).

Esti scraper recueye informacin de les siguientes webs: MusicBrainz, last.fm, allmusic.com y amazon.de, mentanto obtin les imxenes de fanart.tv, last.fm y allmusic.com. Permite especificar de qu web se quier obtener la informacin pa cada campu. La gueta inicial faise siempre en MusicBrainz. En casu de que los enllaces a allmusic y/o amazon.de nun tean amestaos na web de MusicBrainz, nun van poder obtenese los campos d'informacin d' estos dos sitios (magar que ye mui fcil amestar esos enllaces que falten)

This scraper collects information from the following supported sites: MusicBrainz, last.fm, allmusic.com and amazon.de, while grabs artwork from: fanart.tv, last.fm and allmusic.com. It can be set field by field that from which site you want that specific information.
The initial search is always done on MusicBrainz. In case allmusic and/or amazon.de links are not added on the MusicBrainz site, fields from allmusic.com and/or amazon.de cannot be fetched (very easy to add those missing links though).

extension.description: TheAudioDB.com is 'n gemeenskaps gedrewe databasis van oudio vrystellings. Dit is ons mikpunt om die mees eenvoudige, maklikste om te gebruik en akkurate bron van Musiek metadata op die web te wees. Ons verskaf ook 'n API vir toegang tot ons stoorplek van data sodat dit in vele gewilde HTPC en Mobiele programme gebruik kan word om jou die beste moontlike oudio ondervinding te gee sonder die moeite.

TheAudioDB.com ye una base de datos impulsada pola comunid de los contenos d'audio. El nuesu oxetivu ye ser la fonte ms cenciella, fcil d'usar y precisa pa los metadatos de msica na web. Tamin proporcionamos una API p'acceder al nuesu repositoriu de datos pa que pueda usase nos HTPC ms populares y aplicaciones mviles pa da-y la meyor esperiencia d'audio posible ensin molesties.

Mae TheAudioDB.com yn gronfa ddata cyfryngau sain cymunedol. Ein nod yw bod y symlaf, hawsaf a mwyaf cywir o'r ffynonellau cerddoriaeth ar y we. Rydym hefyd yn darparu API i gael mynediad at ein storfa data fel bod modd ei ddefnyddio gan raglenni cyfryngau ac apiau symudol i gynnig y profiad gorau a'r mwyaf didrafferth.

TheAudioDB.com er en community-drevet database over lyd-udgivelser. Det er vores ml at vre den mest simple, tilgngelige og prcise kilde til musik-metadata p nettet. Vi tilbyder ogs API-adgang til vores datalager, s det kan bruges i mange populre HTPC- og mobilprogrammer og give dig den bedst mulige lydoplevelse uden besvret.

TheAudioDB.com ist eineDatenbank fr Musik-Verffentlichungen, die von der Community angetrieben wird. Unser Ziel ist es, die einfachste und genaueste Quelle fr Audio-Metadaten im Web zu sein. Wir bieten auch eine API an, die den Zugriff durch viele populre HTPC- und Mobile-Apps ermglicht, um dir das bestmgliche Hrerlebnis zu grantieren

TheAudioDB.com is a community driven database of audio releases. It is our aim to be the most simple, easy to use and accurate source for Music metadata on the web. We also provide an API to access our repository of data so it can be used in many popular HTPC and Mobile apps to give you the best possible audio experience without the hassle.

Tambin proporcionamos una API para acceder a nuestro repositorio de datos para que pueda ser utilizado en los mas populares HTPC y aplicaciones mviles para darle la mejor experiencia de audio posible sin molestias.

TheAudioDb.com es una base de datos de publicaciones de audio manejada por la comunidad. Nuestro objetivo es ser la fuente de metadata de Msica ms simple, fcil de usar y precisa de internet. Tambin tenemos una API para acceder a nuestro repositorio de datos para ser usada en cualquiera de los ms famosos sistemas para HTPC o aplicaciones mviles para darte la mejor experiencia en audio.

TheAudioDB.com on kogukonna poolt arendatav muusika info andmebaas. Meie eesmrk on olla kige lihtsam, kergesti kasutatav ja tpseim muusika metaandmete andmebaas veebis. Sisule ligipsemiseks on vimalik kasutada API't nii et paljud populaarsed HTPC'd ja mobiilirakendused saavad sulle pakkuda parimat muusikakogemust ilma liigse tlita.

TheAudioDB.com on yhteisn yllpitm ja pivittm tietokanta audiojulkaisuista. Tavoitteenamme on olla Internetin yksinkertaisin, helppokyttisin ja virheettmin tietolhde musiikin metadatalle. Tarjoamme mys rajapinnan datalle, jolloin sivustoa on helppo kytt eri viihdekeskuksissa ja mobiilisovelluksissa.

TheAudioDB.com est une communaut intgrant une base de donnes des sorties audio. Notre but est d'tre la plus simple, la plus facile utiliser et la plus efficace source de mtadonnes musicale sur le web. Nous fournissons une bibliothque de programmation permettant l'accs nos donnes facilement afin de l'utiliser sur tous les supports d'applications mobile et HTPC pour garantir la meilleure exprience audio possible.

TheAudioBD,com est une une base de donnes communautaire de ralisations audio. Notre but est d'tre la source de mtadonnes musicales la plus simple, facile utiliser et prcise sur le Web. Nous fournissons galement une API pour accder notre dpt de donnes afin qu'il puisse tre utilis dans plusieurs HTPC et applis mobiles populaires, pour vous donner la meilleure exprience audio possible sans les tracas!

TheAudioDB.com e una base de datos de lanzamentos de audio impulsada por unha comunidade. O noso obxectivo ser unha fonte de msica o mis simple, doada de usar e exacta posbel na web, tamn fornecemos dun API que poida ser usado para acceder ao noso repositorio de datos dende moitos dos mis populares HTPCs e aplicacins mbiles para ofrecerte a mellor experiencia sonora sen problemas.

TheAudioDB.com je baza podatka glazbenih izdanja koju odrava zajednica korisnika. Na cilj je biti najjednostavniji, lagan za koritenje i toan izvor glazbenih meta podataka na webu. Ujedno pruamo i API za pristup naem repozitoriju, kako bi se mogao koristiti u mnogim popularnim HTPC i mobilnim aplikacijama i time omoguio najbolje glazbeno iskustvo bez previe truda.

A TheAudioDB.com webhely egy kzssg ltal fejlesztett zenei adatbzis. A clunk, hogy a legegyszerbb, knnyen hasznlhat s pontos forrs legynk a zenvel kapcsolatos adatok elrshez. Biztostunk egy alkalmazsi felletet (API) a trhelynkn tallhat adatok elrsre, hogy szmos HTPC s mobil alkalmazs elrhesse azt, ezltal biztostva a lehet legteljesebb zenei lmnyt.

TheAudioDB.com adalah database rilis audio yang digerakkan oleh komunitas. Tujuan kami adalah menjadi sumber yang paling sederhana, paling mudah digunakan dan akurat untuk metadata Musik di jejaring. Kami juga menyediakan API untuk mengakses repositori data kami sehingga dapat digunakan oleh banyak HTPC dan Mobile apps sehingga memberi Anda pengalaman audio terbaik tanpa repot.

TheAudioDB.com er samflagsdrifinn gagnagrunnur yfir pltutgfu. Markmi okkar er a vera einfaldasta, notandavnasta og reianlegasta veita fyrir tarupplsingar um tnlist vefnum. Vi bjum lka forritaskil (API) til a nlgast gagnaveitu okkar svo hgt s a nota au mrgum vinslum heimabtlvum (HTPC) og farsma-ppum til a veita r bestu fanlegu tnlistarupplifun n vandra.

Forniamo anche una API per accedere al nostro archivio di dati in modo che possa essere utilizzato in molti HTPC popolari e applicazioni mobili per darvi la migliore esperienza audio possibile; senza fastidio.

TheAudioDB.com er en samfunns-drevet database av musikk utgivelser. Det er vrt ml bli den enkleste, lettest bruke og nyaktigeste kilden av Musikk metadata p nettet. Vi tilbyr ogs en API for f tilgang til dataen slik at den kan bli brukt i mange populre HTPC og Mobil apps for gi den beste lyd opplevelsen uten problemer.

TheAudioDB.com uma base de dados de edies de udio, mantida pela comunidade. Esta fonte de metadados de Msica da web tem como metas a simplicidade, facilidade de utilizao e exactido. Tambm fornecemos uma API para aceder ao nosso repositrio de dados, para poder ser usada em muitas aplicaes mveis e de HTPC. Assim ter a melhor experincia de udio possvel, sem complicaes.

Hierdie skraper versamel informasie van die volgende ondersteunde werwe: TheAudioDb.com, MusicBrainz, last.fm, en allmusic.com, terwyl kunswerke gryp van: fanart.tv, htbackdrops.com, last.fm en allmusic.com. Dit kan veld vir veld gestel word vanaf watter werf jy die spesifike informasie wil h.
Die aanvanklike soektog word altyd op MusicBrainz gedoen. Ingeval die allmusic skakel nie bygevoeg is op die MusicBrainz werf, kan velde van allmusic.com nie gaan haal word nie (egter baie maklik om daardie ontbrekende skakels by te voeg).

The initial search is always done on MusicBrainz. In case allmusic link is not added on the MusicBrainz site fields from allmusic.com cannot be fetched (very easy to add those missing links though).

Bydd y chwilio cychwynnol yn cael ei wneud ar MusicBrainz. Rhag ofn nad yw dolen allmusic wedi ei osod ar wefan MusicBrainz nid oes modd estyn meysydd o allmusic.com (mae'n hawdd gosod y dolenni coll hynny).

Het is mogelijk om per veld aan te geven van welke website je de specifieke informatie wilt halen.
De initile zoekopdracht wordt altijd uitgevoerd op MusicBrainz. Wanneer de allmusic link niet is toegevoegd in de juiste velden op de MusicBrainz website kan de informatie van allmusic.com niet worden opgehaald. (Het is erg makkelijk om deze ontbrekende links toe te voegen.)

Denne skraperen samler informasjon fra flgende stttede steder: TheAudioDb.com, MusicBrainz, last.fm og allmusic.com, mens den henter artwork fra: fanart.tv, htbackdrops.com, last.fm og allmusic.com. Du kan stegvis velge hvilken kilde du nsker og hente spesifikk informasjon fra.
Det frste sket er alltid gjort hos MusicBrainz. I tilfeller hvor allmusic-linker ikke er lagt til hos MusicBrainz-siden, kan ikke felter fra allmusic.com hentes (det er veldig lett legge til de manglende linkene).

Ten ekstraktor pobiera informacje z nastpujcych stron: TheAudioDb.com, MusicBrainz, last.fm, and allmusic.com, a grafiki pobiera z: fanart.tv, htbackdrops.com, last.fm i allmusic.com. Dla kadego pola z informacjami mona wybra osobn stron.
Pocztkowe wyszukiwanie jest zawsze wykonywane w serwisie MusicBrainz. Gdy wyszukiwanie nie jest wskazane na stron MusicBrainz, nastpuje przeszukiwanie serwisu allmusic.com (brakujce linki mona atwo doda pniej).

Este colector recolhe informaes dos seguintes stios: TheAudioDb.com, MusicBrainz, last.fm e allmusic.com, enquanto obtm artwork de: fanart.tv, htbackdrops.com, last.fm e allmusic.com. Pode definir em cada campo o stio de onde quer obter as informaes.
A pesquisa inicial sempre feita no MusicBrainz. Caso um endereo allmusic no tenha sido adicionado no stio MusicBrainz, os campos do allmusic.com no sero obtidos (no entanto, muito fcil adicionar os links em falta).

Este scraper coleta informaes nos seguintes sites: MusicBrainz, last.fm, allmusic.com e amazon.de, enquanto pega os artwork de: fanart.tv, last.fm and allmusic.com. O Mesmo pode ser configurara campo a campo em que site voc quer obter informaes especficas. A procura inicial sempre feita no MusicBrainz. No caso allmusic e/ou amazon.de no terem sido adicionados no site MusicBrainz, campos de allmusic.com e/ou amazona.de no sero buscados (embora seja muito fcil adicionar os links faltantes).

Acest scraper colecteaz informaii de la urmtoarele site-uri suportate: TheAudioDb.com, MusicBrainz, last.fm, i allmusic.com, i opere de art de la: fanart.tv, htbackdrops.com, last.fm i allmusic.com. Poate fi setat cmp cu cmp de pe care site-ul dorii informaii specifice cutarea iniial se face ntotdeauna face pe MusicBrainz.. n cazul n care link-ul Allmusic nu este adugat la MusicBrainz, allmusic.com nu poate fi folosit (ns este relativ uor s adugai aceste link-uri lips).

themoviedb.org is a free and open movie database. It's completely user driven by people like you. TMDb is currently used by millions of people every month and with their powerful API, it is also used by many popular media centers like Kodi to retrieve Movie Metadata, Posters and Fanart to enrich the user's experience.

extension.description: TheTVDB.com is 'n TV Skraper. Die werf is 'n massiewe oop databasis wat deur enige iemand verander kan word en bevat vol meta data vir baie vertonings in verskillende tale. Alle inhoud en prente op die werf is bygedra deur sy gebruikers vir sy gebruikers en het 'n ho standaard van kwaliteit. Die databasis skema en webruimte is oopbron onder die GPL.

TheTVDB.com is a TV Scraper. The site is a massive open database that can be modified by anybody and contains full meta data for many shows in different languages. All content and images on the site have been contributed by their users for users and have a high standard or quality. The database schema and website are open source under the GPL.
TheTVDB.com . , . . GPL .

TheTVDB.com s un raspador de TV. El lloc s una base de dades oberta massiva que pot ser modificat per qualsevol persona i cont metadades completes de molts programes en diferents idiomes. Tot el contingut i imatges en el lloc han estat aportat pels usuaris per als usuaris i tenen un alt nivell o qualitat. L'esquema de la base de dades i la pgina web sn de codi obert sota la llicncia GPL.

TheTVDB.com je zdroj metadat pro televizn poady. Strnka je masivn oteven databze, kterou me kdokoliv upravovat a obsahuje veker metadata v rznch jazycch k mnoha poadm. Vechen obsah a obrzky jsou poskytnuty uivateli pro uivatele a maj vysokou kvalitu. Nvrhov vzor databze a webov strnka jsou svobodn software licencovan pod GPL.

Mae TheTVDB.com yn Grafwr Teledu. Mae'r wefan yn gronfa ddata anferthol agored y mae modd ei addasu gan unrhyw un ac yn cynnwys meta data llaw llawer o sioeau mewn ieithoedd gwahanol. Mae'r holl gynnwys a delweddau ar y wefan wedi ei gyfrannu gan eu defnyddwyr ac i safon uchel . Mae cynllun y gronfa ddata a'r wefan yn god agored o dan y GPL.

TheTVDB.com er en TV-scraper. Siden er en massiv ben database, som alle kan modificere, og den indeholder fyldestgrende metadata for mange serier p forskellige sprog. Alt indhold og alle billeder p siden er tilfjet af brugere og har en hj standard eller kvalitet. Databasens model og webside er open source under GPL.

TheTVDB.com ist ein Scraper fr TV-Shows. Die Seite ist eine riesige, offene Datenbank, die von jedem angepasst werden kann und weitreichende Metadaten fr viele TV-Shows, in verschiedenen Sprachen, enthlt. Alle Inhalte und Bilder dieser Seite wurden von Benutzern fr Benutzer zusammengetragen und folgen dabei dem hohen Standard fr Qualitt. Das Datenbankschema sowie die Webseite sind nach der GPL-Lizenvereinbarung OpenSource.
TVDB.com Scraper . - . , . GPL.

This cloud drive addon uses a third-party authentication mechanism commonly known as OAuth 2.0. If you want to know more about OAuth 2.0 you can visit the following pages: - https://oauth.net/2/ - https://developers.google.com/identity/protocols/OAuth2 - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/onedrive/developer/rest-api/getting-started/msa-oauth
Kodi and myself take no responsibility or liability.
The authentication server URL is specified in Settings / Advanced / Sign-in Server. The Sign-in Server implements the OAuth 2.0 protocol. The complete source code of the Sign-in Server can be download here: https://github.com/cguZZman/drive-login You can clone the project and host it in your own server.

Surfen auf Webseiten mit einer Fernbedienung

extension.description: The most powerful way to access content on Netflix and YouTube and Amazon Instant Video would be a web browser, if web browsers provided good native support for a 10-foot user interface. This add-on launches a browser and connects the arrow buttons on the remote control to the mouse pointer. This is the most user-friendly way to consume online content without needing a wireless keyboard.

The most powerful way to access content on Netflix and YouTube and Amazon Instant Video would be a web browser, if web browsers provided good native support for a 10-foot user interface. This add-on launches a browser and connects the arrow buttons on the remote control to the mouse pointer. This is the most user-friendly way to consume online content without needing a wireless keyboard.

Der beste Weg, um auf Inhalte auf Netflix und YouTube und Amazon Instant Video zuzugreifen wre ein Webbrowser, wenn Webbrowser fr eine 10-Fu-Benutzeroberflche gute native Untersttzung bten. Dieses Addon startet einen Browser und verbindet die Pfeiltasten auf der Fernbedienung mit dem Mauszeiger. Dies ist der benutzerfreundlichste Weg Online-Inhalte zu konsumieren, ohne eine drahtlose Tastatur zu bentigen.

A forma mais poderosa de acessar o contedo no Netflix e YouTube e Amazon Instant Video seria um navegador web, se navegadores web fornecessem um bom suporte nativo para a interface de usurio de 10-foot. Este add-on inicia um navegador e conecta os botes de navigao do controle remoto para o ponteiro do mouse. Esta a interface mais amigvel para consumir contedo online sem a necessidade de um teclado sem fio.
extension.disclaimer: The experience will be degraded unless these external dependencies are installed: psutil, pulsectl, pyalsaaudio, pylirc2, and Pillow. Another helpful utility is unclutter, which automatically hides the mouse pointer. (On a Debian-based system, run sudo apt-get install -y python-pip python-psutil python-alsaaudio python-pylirc python-pil unclutter && sudo pip install pulsectl). Finally, a theme with a large mouse pointer will improve pointer visibility, (e.g., https://www.gnome-look.org/p/999574/).

The experience will be degraded unless these external dependencies are installed: psutil, pulsectl, pyalsaaudio, pylirc2, and Pillow. Another helpful utility is unclutter, which automatically hides the mouse pointer. (On a Debian-based system, run sudo apt-get install -y python-pip python-psutil python-alsaaudio python-pylirc python-pil unclutter && sudo pip install pulsectl). Finally, a theme with a large mouse pointer will improve pointer visibility, (e.g., https://www.gnome-look.org/p/999574/).

Die Erfahrung wird vermindert werden, wenn nicht diese externen Abhngigkeiten installiert sind: psutil, pulsectl, pyalsaaudio, pylirc2 und Pillow. Ein weiteres hilfreiches Werkzeug ist unclutter, das automatisch den Mauszeiger versteckt. (Auf einem Debian-basierten System fhren Sie sudo apt-get install -y python-pip python-psutil python-alsaaudio python-pylirc python-pil unclutter && sudo pip install pulsectl aus). Schlielich wird ein Theme mit einem groen Mauszeiger die Sichtbarkeit verbessern, (zum Beispiel https://www.gnome-look.org/p/999574/).

A experincia ser degradada, a menos que essas dependncias externas estejam instaladas: psutil, pulsectl, pyalsaaudio, pylirc2 e Pillow. Outra ferramenta til unclutter, que oculta automaticamente o ponteiro do mouse. (Em um sistema baseado em Debian, execute sudo apt-get install -y python-pip python-psutil python-alsaaudio python-pylirc python-pil unclutter && sudo pip install pulsectl). Finalmente, um tema com um ponteiro do mouse grande ir melhorar a visibilidade do ponteiro, (por exemplo, https://www.gnome-look.org/p/999574/).

extension.description: Install Premium Quality Legal Addons

Elementum is a torrent finding and streaming engine. It doesn't go on torrent websites for legal reasons. However, it calls specially crafted add-ons (called providers) that are installed separately.[CR]This project is a fork of the well known, but no longer maintained Pulsar/Quasar projects from steeve and scakemyer.

Elementum je pogon pretraivanja i strujanja. Ne posjeuje torrent web stranice iz pravnih razloga. Ipak, koristi posebno napravljene dodatke (nazvane pruatelji usluge) koji su instalirani odvojeno.[CR]Ovaj projekt je ogranak dobro poznatih, ali vie ne odravanih Pulsar/Quasar projekata od autora steevea i scakemyera.

Elementum es un motor de bsqueda y transmisin torrent. No navega por sitios web torrent por razones legales. Sin embargo, llama a complementos especialmente diseados para ello (denominados providers o proveedores) que se instalan por separado.[CR]Este proyecto es un fork de los bien conocidos, pero ya sin soporte proyectos Pulsar/Quasar de steeve y scakemyer.[CR]

extension.summary: livestreamspro- shamelessly forked from livestreams but added many thinks
extension.description: In addition to what livestreams allowed you to do, you can now, 1. call regex in regex, 2. multiple regex in page, regex in session, also htmlunescape responses 3. create session from one regex and pass onto next in line 4. save sessions to a file and open again later 5. write python code in .py file, put in the profile directory and then call from your regex. 6. use epoctime, guid and unpack as functions already defined. 7. Use it to post values to the pages to get the proper responses 8. support many headers, like origin, X-Requested-With 9. you can now append cookies in response and then read in regex using includeheaders 10. You can now link to another web url via your xml using externallink 11. support for google captcha, now you can show and then post the text

1.3.0 - Added default icons. - Added transparency to existing icons for better themes integration. - Added virtual directories feature allowing a better categorization of m3u lists. - Refresh favourites list when moving an item. - Ability to move playlists root and directories sides. - Refresh playlists and directories when moving an item. - Disabled TvDb and MovieDb for now ( waiting for improvements )

extension.summary: Plays Random Trailers from Multiple Sources
extension.description: Plays random movie trailers from a variety of sources:[CR]-The Users Movie Library[CR]-Apple iTunes[CR]-YouTube(via themoviedb.org)[CR]-A user specified folder[CR] Installs as a Screensaver and a Program. There are Options to filter by genre, and Rating, select number of trailers, hide trailers of watched movies, and display opening / closing animations. When viewing trailers you can press UP or I to view movie information and DOWN or I to hide. RIGHT or X will display next trailer. LEFT or ESC will exit. If the current playing trailer is from the users movie library hitting enter or return will play the associated movie.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: Screensaver that turns your display off to save power
extension.description:
The Turn Off screensaver turns your TV, projector or screen off, like any old fashioned screensaver is intended to do.
Next to managing your display, it can also manage your device power state, log your profile off or mute audio to avoid sounds through your A/V receiver.
extension.news:
v0.10.2 (2019-11-21) - Create separate entrypoint - Improve stability - Add more unit tests
v0.10.1 (2019-10-30) - Add sanity tests, unit tests and coverage support - Use JSON-RPC for all built-ins - Improvements for Python 3 - Support Odroid-C2 display method

extension.description: CU LRC Lyrics is a lyrics script for Kodi. It supports regular as well as LRC Lyrics. The script can search synchronized/unsynchronized lyrics embedded, from file or by scrapers. It can read .lrc/.txt lyrics file saved at the same path by same file name with .mp3(or other type of music).
CU LRC . .lrc . / . .lrc .txt , ( .mp3 ) .

CU LRC Lyrics es un script de lletres de canons per a Kodi. Suporta lletres normal tan com LRC Lyrics. El script busca lletres sincronitzades o no, incrustades al fitxer d'udio, des de un altre fitxer o per scrapers. Pot llegir fitxers .lrc/.txt guardats al mateix directori i nom de fitxer amb .mp3(o un altre tipus de msica).

CU LRC Lyrics er et script til sangtekster til Kodi. Det understtter almindelige svel som LRC sangtekster. Script'et kan sge i synkroniserede/usynkroniserede sangtekster som er inkodede i filer eller ved hjlp af scrapere. Det kan lse .lrc/.txt sangtekstfiler som er gemt i den samme mappe og med samme filnavn som mp3'en (eller andre typer af musikfiler).

CU LRC-Songtext ist ein Songtextskript fr Kodi, das sowohl normale als auch LRC-Songtexte untersttzt. Das Skript kann nach synchronisierten/unsynchronisierten eingebetteten Songtexten von Datei oder Scraper suchen. Es kann .lrc/.txt-Songtextdateien lesen, die im gleichen Pfad und mit dem gleichen Dateinamen mit .mp3 (oder eine anderen Musikart) gespeichert wurden.
CU LRC script Kodi. LRC. script , , scraper. .lrc/.txt .mp3 ( ).

CU LRC Lyrics is a lyrics script for Kodi. It supports regular as well as LRC Lyrics. The script can search synchronized/unsynchronized lyrics embedded, from file or by scrapers. It can read .lrc/.txt lyrics file saved at the same path by same file name with .mp3(or other type of music).

CU LRC Lyrics is a lyrics script for Kodi. It supports regular as well as LRC Lyrics. The script can search synchronised/unsynchronised lyrics embedded, from file or by scrapers. It can read .lrc/.txt lyrics file saved at the same path by same file name with .mp3(or other type of music).

CU LRC Lyrics is a lyrics script for Kodi. It supports regular as well as LRC Lyrics. The script can search synchronized/unsynchronized lyrics embedded, from file or by scrapers. It can read .lrc/.txt lyrics file saved at the same path by same file name with .mp3(or other type of music).

CU LRC Lyrics es un script de letras para Kodi. Es compatible tanto con letra regular como LRC Lyrics. El script puede buscar desde archivo o a travs de scrapers letras incrustadas sincronizadas o no sincronizadas. Puede leer archivos .lrc/.txt guardados en la misma carpeta con el mismo nombre del archivo *.mp3 (u otro tipo de archivo de audio).

CU LRC Lyrics est un script pour grer les paroles dans Kodi. Il supporte les formats de paroles habituels aussi bien que LRC. Le script peut chercher des paroles synchronises/dsynchronises intgres dans les fichier ou par collecteurs. Il peut lire les fichiers paroles .lrc/.txt stocks dans le mme dossier et avec le mme nom que le fichier .mp3 (ou autre type de format musical).

Paroles CU LRC est un script de paroles pour Kodi. Il prend en charge les paroles rgulires et LRC. Le script peut rechercher des paroles synchronises/dsynchronises intgres, d'un fichier ou de rcuprateurs. Il peut lire les fichiers de paroles .lrc/.txt enregistrs dans le mme chemin et avec le me nom que le .mp3 (ou autres types de musique).

Letras CU LRC un script de letras para Kodi. Soporta letras normais como as LRC. O script pode buscar letras sincronizadas/non sincronizadas incrustadas, ou buscar a partir dun ficheiro ou de scrapers. Pode ler letras de ficheiros .lrc/.txt gardados na mesma ruta do ficheiro .mp3 (ou outro tipo de msica).
CU LRC Lyrics Kodi LRC . / , . txt/lrc -mp3 ( ).

CU LRC tekstovi pjesama je skripta za Kodi. Podravna redovne i LRC tekstove pjesama. Skripta moe pretraivati usklaivati/uklanjati ugraene tekstove pjesama, iz datoteke ili sakupljaa. Moe itati .lrc/.txt datoteke tekstova pjesama spremljene u istu putanju s istim nazivom datoteke sa .mp3 (ili drugim vrstama glazbe).

A CU LRC Dalszveg egy kiegszt az Kodi-hez, ami tmogatja a hagyomnyos s az LRC dalszvegek keresst, megjelentst. A dalszveg lehet szinkronizlt, vagy szinkronizlatlan, a zenefjlba begyazott, vagy leolvaskkal letlttt, vagy akr szrmazhat a zene knyvtrban tallhat .lrc vagy .txt fjlokbl is.

Lirik CU LRC adalah script lirik untuk Kodi. Mendukung lirik regular maupun LRC. Script ini mampu mencari lirik dengan singkronisasi maupun tidak yang tercantum pada berkas atau melalui alat penyalin. Script dapat membaca berkas lirik .lrc/.txt yang disimpan di lokasi dan nama berkas yang sama dengan .mp3 (atau format musik lainnya).

CU LRC Lyrics uno script per i testi per Kodi. Supporta testi come LRC. Lo script pu cercare testi incorporati sincronizzati e non, da file o tramite scapers. Legge file .lrc/.txt salvati nello stesso percorso e con lo stesso nome dell'.mp3 (o altri tipi di musica)
CU LRC Lyrics Kodi . LRC , / . mp3( ) .lrc/.txt .

CU LRC Lyrics yra dain odi atsiuntimo skriptas, skirtas Kodi. Palaikomi tiek prasti, tiek LRC dain odiai. Skriptas gali iekoti sinchronizuot / nesinchronizuot dain odi, integruot failuose arba naudojant skreperius. Jis gali nuskaityti .lrc/.txt dain odi failus, isaugotus toje paioje vietoje ir tokiu paiu pavadinimu kaip ir .mp3 failas (ar kitokio muzikinio failo tipo).

CU LRC Lyrics is een script voor songteksten in Kodi. Het ondersteunt zowel reguliere als LRC songteksten. Het script ondersteunt gesynchroniseerde of ongesynchroniseerde songteksten die ingebed zijn in een bestand, in een los bestand staan of van een scraper. Het kan .lrc/.txt songtekst-bestanden lezen die opgeslagen zijn op hetzelfde pad en dezelfde bestandsnaam hebben als de .mp3 (of ander type bestand).

CU LRC Lyrics er et skript for vise sangtekster i Kodi. Den sttter vanlige samt LRC sangtekster. Skriptet kan ske synkroniserte / usynkroniserte sangtekster innebygd, fra en fil eller via skrapere. Den kan lese .lrc / .txt filer som er lagret p den samme banen og med samme filnavn (.mp3 eller annen type musikk).

CU LRC Lyrics jest dodatkiem obsugujcym teksty utworw dla Kodi. Obsuguje teksty utworw zarwno zwyke jak i zsynchronizowane. Dodatek potrafi wyszuka teksty zapisane lokalnie, wbudowane w pliki utworw, a take pobiera je z Internetu. Potrafi wczyta teksty w formatach .lrc/.txt zapisane w tym samym folderze co pliku utworu .mp3 (lub innym wspierany formacie).

CU LRC Lyrics um script de letras para o Kodi. Suporta letras normais e LRC. O script pode encontrar letras sincronizadas/dessincronizadas embutidas, ou procurar a partir de ficheiro ou de colectores. Pode ler letras de ficheiros .lrc/.txt guardados na mesma localizao do ficheiro .mp3 (ou outro tipo de msica).

CU LRC Lyrics script de letras de msicas para Kodi. Ele suporta regular bem como Letras LRC. O script pode procurar por letras embutidas sincronizadas/dessincronizadas, de arquivos ou usando scrapers. Ele pode ler arquivos de letras .lrc/txt salvos no mesmo caminho com o mesmo nome do arquivo .mp3 (ou outro formato de msica).

CU LRC Lyrics je doplnok poskytujci texty skladieb pre Kodi. Podporuje ben ako aj LRC formty. Doplnok me vyhadva synchronizovan/nesynchronizovan Texty skladieb vloen, v samostatnom sbore alebo cez sahovae. Doke ta .lrc/.txt sbory v rovnakom prieinku a s rovnakm nzvom ako .mp3 sbor (alebo in hudobn sbor).

CU LRC Lyrics je skripta za besedila pesmi za Kodi. Podpira redne kot tudi LRC besedila pesmi. Skripta lahko ie sinhronizirana/nesinhronizirana besedila pesmi, vgrajena, iz datoteke ali od ponudnikov. Bere lahko .lrc/.txt formate zapisa datotek iz iste mape kot je istoimenska datoteka .mp3 (ali drigi format zapisa glasbe).

CU LRC Lyrics r ett skript fr Kodi. Det stdjer svl vanliga som LRC texter. Skriptet kan ska synkroniserade/osynkroniserade texter inbddade frn fil eller frn skraport. Det kan lsa .lrc/.txt filer sparade med samma skvg och filnamn som .mp3 (eller annan typ av musik).

extension.summary: Fast and simple WSGI-framework for small web-applications
extension.description: Bottle is a fast and simple micro-framework for small web applications. It offers request dispatching (Routes) with url parameter support, templates, a built-in HTTP Server and adapters for many third party WSGI/HTTP-server and template engines - all in a single file and with no dependencies other than the Python Standard Library.

Stores cached data in sqlite3.Blobs. Calculates lifetime, freshness as virtual columns. Obeys cache control directives, immutable, no-store, etc. Supports etag, last_modified, etc for validation. Can be used as a generic key/blob data store when used without directives

extension.summary: Mutagen is a Python module to handle audio metadata.
extension.description: Mutagen is a Python module to handle audio metadata. It supports ASF, FLAC, M4A, Monkey's Audio, MP3, Musepack, Ogg Opus, Ogg FLAC, Ogg Speex, Ogg Theora, Ogg Vorbis, True Audio, WavPack and OptimFROG audio files. All versions of ID3v2 are supported, and all standard ID3v2.4 frames are parsed. It can read Xing headers to accurately calculate the bitrate and length of MP3s. ID3 and APEv2 tags can be edited regardless of audio format. It can also manipulate Ogg streams on an individual packet/page level.
extension.disclaimer: Code taken from http://code.google.com/p/mutagen/
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: IMDB, Trakt, Oscar and Stand-up Tag Generator
extension.description: Helps you create Smart Playlists from IMDb/Trakt Watchlists by tagging local movies found in specified lists. Also creates a stand-up comedy tag based on Wikipedia comedians, as there is no genre for stand-up. Specify your IMDb/Trakt watchlists then choose your desired Kodi tag for each list. Runs as a service in the background at a specified interval, and also allows for manual creation. For Trakt, you can add lists from your own account, from public accounts, or shared lists from anyone you are friends with (people you follow, who follow you back). Oscar tagging lets you tag winners and/or nominees with each award for each movie in the following format 'Winner: Best Motion Picture'.

extension.description:
Web Viewer is a linear text web browser. It is linear because it doesn't render pages, it filters them and displays text in the order it is found in the original HTML.
Web viewer also allows addon developers to process application authorization (ie. facebook,flickr etc.) with little programming and without violating terms of use.
What it does: *You can follow links, fill out forms, view images *Stream video/audio links *It has back/forward history *Bookmarks
What it doesn't do: *Handle style sheets, javascript, flash, etc. *Make web pages look good :) *Lots of other stuff

This XML is then copied to the web via FTP and can be parsed via JavaScript on webpage to display what KODI is playing. For HTML-JavaScript or PHP example, see html_demo subfolder in plugin folder, or NOW PLAYING page on my web (visualx.lanik.org).

Presvlaka dizajnirana za koritenje na ureajima s dodirom na zaslon poput tableta i pametnih telefona
Egy rintkpernys eszkzkre, pldul tblagpekre s okostelefonokra tervezett fellet
Skinn sem er hanna til notkunar tkjum me snertiskj, eins og til dmis spjaldtlvum og snjallsmum.

Temin ivaizda pritaikyta naudojimui renginiuose su lieiamaisiais ekranais, tokiuose kaip planetiniai kompiuteriai ar imanieji telefonai
Kulit direka untuk digunakan pada peranti berskrin sentuh seperti tablet dan telefon pintar

extension.description: Archive support

This addon is an extraction utility for RAR archives.
It allows direct reading of uncompressed RAR files, so prior unpacking is not necessary. For all other types, it is temporarily unpacked and passed to Kodi.
Attention: A "Solid RAR" archive type requires complete unpacking to use files within it. Hence access times may be long for larger packages.
extension.disclaimer: This version requires at least Kodi Leia 18.6; please use 2.0.8 for earlier Leia versions

extension.description:
This addon allows Kodi to read content from a Super Audio CD ISO image.
Super Audio CD (SACD) is a read-only optical disc format for audio storage, introduced in 1999, developed jointly by Sony and Philips Electronics to be the successor to the Compact Disc.
The SACD format offers more audio channels (e.g. surround sound), a higher bit rate, and longer playing time than a conventional CD.
extension.disclaimer: Playback seek is currently not possible.

extension.description:
The SSH File Transfer Protocol (also Secure File Transfer Protocol, or SFTP) is a network protocol that provides file access, file transfer, and file management over any reliable data stream.
This addon allows file access to data in it.

extension.description: MilkDrop was oorspronklik 'n musiek visualisering "plug-in" vir die Winamp musiek speler. Soos jy na jou musiek luister, laat MilkDrop jou deur die klankgolwe sweef wat jy hoor, en gebruik klop waarnemings om 'n magdom psigedeliese effekte te aktiveer, en 'n visuele reis deur klank te skep.

MilkDrop was originally a music visualizer "plug-in" to the Winamp music player. As you listen to your music, MilkDrop takes you flying through the actual soundwaves you're hearing, and uses beat detection to trigger myriad psychedelic effects, creating a rich visual journey through sound.
"MilkDrop" Winamp. "MilkDrop" "", , . . .

El MilkDrop era originalment un afegit de visualitzaci musical pel reproductor Winamp. Mentre escoltes la msica MilkDrop et porta volant a travs de les ones de so que ests escoltant al moment, i utilitza detecci de tempo per activar una muni d'efectes psicodlics i crea un enriquidor viatge visual a travs del so.

MikDrop bylo pvodn vizualizan rozen pro pehrva hudby Winamp. Pi poslechu va hudby s Vmi MikDrop prolt skrze zvukov vlny, kter slyte, a pouv detekci takt, pro sputn spousty psychedelickch efekt, vytvejce tak zajmavou vizuln cestu skrze zvuk.

Roedd MilkDrop yn wreiddiol yn "ategyn" delweddu cerddoriaeth ar gyfer Winamp. Wrth i chi wrando ar MilkDrop mae MilkDrop yn eich hedeg drwy'r tonnau sain rydych yn eu clywed gan ddefnyddio canfodydd trawiad i gychwyn effeithiau seicadelig amrywiol gan greu taith weledol cyfoethog drwy'r sain.

Milkdrop var oprindeligt et musikvisualisering "plug-in" til Winamp musikafspilleren. Mens du lytter til din musik, tager Milkdrop dig p en flyvetur gennem de faktiske lydblger du hrer og bruger beat-genkendelse til at udlse en myriade af psykedeliske effekter, der skaber en visuel rejse gennem lyd.

MilkDrop war ursprnglich ein Musik-Visualizer "Plug-in" fr den Musik-Player Winamp.Wenn Sie Ihre Musik hren, fliegen Sie mit MilkDrop durch die aktuellen Klangwellen die Sie hren. Und die Beat-Erkennung wird genutzt um unzhlige psychedelische Effekte auslsen, die Schaffung einer visuellen Reise durch den Klang.
MilkDrop "plug-in" Winamp. , MilkDrop , , .

MilkDrop was originally a music visualiser "plug-in" to the Winamp music player. As you listen to your music, MilkDrop takes you flying through the actual soundwaves you're hearing, and uses beat detection to trigger myriad psychedelic effects, creating a rich visual journey through sound.

MilkDrop was originally a music visualiser "plug-in" to the Winamp music player. As you listen to your music, MilkDrop takes you flying through the actual soundwaves you're hearing, and uses beat detection to trigger a myriad of psychedelic effects, creating a rich visual journey through sound.

MilkDrop was originally a music visualizer "plug-in" to the Winamp music player. As you listen to your music, MilkDrop takes you flying through the actual soundwaves you're hearing, and uses beat detection to trigger myriad psychedelic effects, creating a rich visual journey through sound.

MilkDrop era originalmente un plug-in visualizador de msica para Winamp. Mientras escuchas msica, MilkDrop te lleva volando a travs de las ondas que ests escuchando, y utiliza la deteccin del ritmo para activar una gran cantidad de efectos psicodlicos, creando una rica experiencia visual a travs del sonido.

MilkDrop era originalmente un plug-in visualizador de msica para Winamp. Mientras escuchas msica, MilkDrop te lleva volando a travs de las ondas que ests escuchando, y utiliza la deteccin del ritmo para activar una gran cantidad de efectos psicodlicos, creando una rica experiencia visual a travs del sonido.

MilkDrop originalmente fue un "plug-in" visualizador de msica para el reproductor de msica Winamp. Mientras escuchas tu msuca, MilkDrop te lleva volando a travs de las ondas de sonido que ests escuchando en ese momento, y usa deteccin de ritmo para desencadenar mltiples efectos psicodlicos, creando un rico recorrido visual a travs del sonido.

MilkDrop oli algselt muusika visuaal plugin Winamp'ile. Muusikat kuulates viib MilkDrop sind lennates lbi kuulatavate helilainete. MilkDrop kasutab rtmituvastust, et psta valla tohutu hulk pshhedeelseid efekte luues visuaalidest rikka teekonna lbi heli.

MilkDrop oli alunperin Winampin visualisaattorilisosa. Kuunnellessasi musiikkia MilkDrop lenntt sinut kuulemiesi niaaltojen lpi ja kytt tahdintunnistusta lukemattomien psykedeelisten tehosteiden toistamiseen, luoden visuaalisen matkan musiikin lpi.

MilkDrop tait l'origine une extension de visualisation musicale pour le lecteur audio Winamp. Pendant que vous coutez votre musique, Milkdrop vous fait voyager travers les ondes sonores que vous entendez, dtectant le rythme pour dclencher une myriade d'effets psychdliques, crant ainsi une riche exprience visuelle et sonore.

MilkDrop tait l'origine un plugiciel de visualisation musicale pour le lecteur audio Winamp. Alors que vous coutez votre musique, Milkdrop vous fait voler au travers des ondes sonores, et utilise la dtection rythmique pour dclencher une myriade d'effets psychdliques, crant un voyage visuel et sonore.

MilkDrop foi orixinalmente un plugin de Visualizacin para mica do reprodutor de msica Winamp. Nametres vostede escoita a sa msica, MilkDrop lvao voando a travs das ondas de son que esta a ouvir, e emprega a deteccin de ritmo para activar milleiros de efectos psicodlicos, creando unha rica viaxe visual a travs do son.

MilkDrop was originally a music visualizer "plug-in" to the Winamp music player. As you listen to your music, MilkDrop takes you flying through the actual soundwaves you're hearing, and uses beat detection to trigger myriad psychedelic effects, creating a rich visual journey through sound.

MilkDrop je orginalno bio zamiljen kao "dodatak" za Winamp glazbeni svira. Dok sluate svoju glazbu, MilkDrop vam omoguuje let kroz zvuk koji ujete i koristi otkrivanje taktova da bi pokrenuo bezbroj psihodelinih efekata, tako stvarajui bogato vizualno zvuno putovanje.

A Milkdrop eredetileg egy beplmodul volt a Winamp zenelejtszhoz. Ahogy hallgatod a zent, a Milkdrop keresztlrept a hallhat hanghullmokon, felhasznlva a dobritmust pszihedelikus effektusok ltrehozsra gazdag ltvnyvilg megteremtsvel.

MilkDrop awalnya adalah pengaya visualisasi musik untuk Winamp. Sembari mendengarkan musik, MilkDrop akan membawa Anda terbang melalui gelombang suara yang Anda dengarkan, dan menggunakan deteksi ketukan untuk menampikan banyak sekali efek psikedelik, menciptakan suatu perjalanan visual yang kaya melalui suara.

Milkdrop var upprunalega vibt vi Winamp tnlistarspilarann. egar hlustar tnlistina, fer Milkdrop me ig flug gegnum hljbylgjurnar sem heyrir og notar taktskynjun til a setja af sta allskonar effekta sem skapa myndrnt feralag gegnum tnlistarupplifunina

MilkDrop era, in origine, un "plug-in" di visualizzazione per Winamp. Mentre ascolti la musica, MilkDrop ti fa volare tra le onde sonore di ci che stai ascoltando usando la rilevazione del ritmo per sincronizzare una miriade di effetti psichedelici, creando un ricco viaggio visuale attraverso il suono.
MilkDrop Winamp
MilkDrop . .
MilkDrop vizualizacija, gauta is Winamp. Klausantis muzikos, MilkDrop nukelia jus i nuostabu skrydi virs debesu, naudojamas ritmo aptikimas, kuris sinchronizuoja muzikos vaizdo efektus.

MilkDrop skotnji bija mzikas vizualizcijas "spraudnis" Winamp mzikas atskaotj. Kamr tu klausies mziku, MilkDrop paem tevi ldz lidojum cauri skaas viiem, kuri skan, un izmanto ritma noteikanu, lai palaistu myriad psihodliskos efektus, radot bagtu vizulo ceojumu cauri skaai.
MilkDrop Winamp music player. , MilkDrop , myriad , .

Milkdrop was oorspronkelijk een muziekvisualisatieplug-in voor de Winamp-muziekspeler. Terwijl u uw muziek beluistert vliegt Milkdrop u door de soundwaves die u op dat moment hoort. Op basis van de beat produceert het een veelvoud aan psychedelische effecten.

MilkDrop var originalt et visualiseringstillegg til musikkavspilleren Winamp. Mens du lytter til musikken din, tar MilkDrop deg med p en reise gjennom de faktiske lydblgene du hrer. Visualiseringen oppdager takten i musikken og bruker denne for skape en rik, visuell ferd gjennom utallige, psykedeliske effekter.

MilkDrop jest wizualizacj pochodzc z odtwarzacza Winamp. W czasie suchania muzyki, MilkDrop zabiera uytkownika w niesamowity lot pomidzy aktualnie odtwarzanymi falami dwikowymi, uywajc detekcji beatu, ktra synchronizuje efekty wizualne z muzyk.

Originalmente, o MilkDrop era uma visualizao do leitor de msica Winamp. Ao ouvir a sua msica, o MilkDrop leva-o a voar pelas ondas sonoras que est a ouvir, detectando o ritmo da msica e desencadeando uma variedade de efeitos psicadlicos. Cria, assim, uma viagem inesquecvel pelo som.

MilkDrop era originalmente uma visualizao do reprodutor de msica Winamp. Ao ouvir a sua msica, o MilkDrop leva-o a voar nas ondas sonoras que est a ouvir, usando deteco de batida para desencadear uma mirade de efeitos psicodlicos. Cria, assim, uma viagem visual inesquecvel pelo som.

MilkDrop a fost original un modul de vizualizare pentru lectorul de muzic Winamp. n timp ce ascultai muzica, MilkDrop v face s zburai printre undele audio actuale pe care le auzii i folosete detecia btii pentru a activa miriada de efecte psihedelice, crend o cltorie vizual bogat printre sunete.
MilkDrop Winamp. , MilkDrop , .

MilkDrop bol pvodne hudobnm vizualizanm rozrenm Winamp prehrvaa. Pri povan hudby s Vami MilkDrop let zvukovmi vlnami, ktor povate a pouitm detekcie rytmu spa nespoetn psychodelick efekty, a vytvra bohat vizulnu cestu zvukom.

MilkDrop je bila prvotno vizualizacija za predvajalnik Winamp. Ko posluate vao glasbo, vas MilkDrop popelje skozi dejansko valovanje, ki ga sliite, in uporablja zaznavanje ritma, kar omogoi psihedelini efekt in bogato vizualno izkunjo predvajanja glasbe.
Milkrop fillimisht ishte nj "plug-in" pr vizualizimin e muziks pr riprodhuesin Winamp. Ndrsa dgjon muzikn tnde, Milkdrop vizualizon valt q i dgjon dhe prdor zbulimin e tingullit pr efekte t ndryshme.

Milkdrop var ursprungligen ett visualiserarande ljudplug-in till Winamp. Medan du lyssnar p din musik s fr dig Milkdrop flygande genom de ljudvgor du hr och anvnder rytmavknning fr att ge dig psykedeliska effekter som skapar en mktig visuell resa via ljudet.
MilkDrop Winamp "". , MilkDrop , , .
MilkDrop Winamp . , MilkDrop , .
MilkDrop "-" Winamp. , MilkDrop , , .

MilkDrop aslnda Winamp mzik alcs iin grsel bir "eklenti" dir. Mziinizi dinlerken, Milkdrop size iittiiniz ses dalgalar arasnda uuyormucasna bir his ve ritm alglaycs ile de en lgn efektleri yayormuasna grsel bir len sunar.
MilkDrop Winamp. MilkDrop , .

MilkDrop ban u l mt "plug-in" trnh din nhc cho Winamp. Khi bn nghe nhc, MilkDrop s lm bn bay bng trong m thanh bn ang nghe, v s dng b d giai iu kch hot v s nhng hiu ng o, to ra mt cuc hnh trnh m thanh qua mt thng
MilkDrop Winamp MilkDrop
MilkDropWinampMilkDrop

Nametres vostede escoita a sa msica, MilkDrop lvao voando a travs das ondas de son que esta a ouvir, e emprega a deteccin de ritmo para activar milleiros de efectos psicodlicos, creando unha rica viaxe visual a travs do son.

MilkDrop was originally a music visualizer "plug-in" to the Winamp music player. As you listen to your music, MilkDrop takes you flying through the actual soundwaves you're hearing, and uses beat detection to trigger myriad psychedelic effects, creating a rich visual journey through sound.

MilkDrop je orginalno bio zamiljen kao "dodatak" za Winamp glazbeni svira. Dok sluate svoju glazbu, MilkDrop vam omoguuje let kroz zvuk koji ujete i koristi otkrivanje taktova da bi pokrenuo bezbroj psihodelinih efekata, tako stvarajui bogato vizualno zvuno putovanje.

A Milkdrop eredetileg egy beplmodul volt a Winamp zenelejtszhoz. Ahogy hallgatod a zent, a Milkdrop keresztlrept a hallhat hanghullmokon, felhasznlva a dobritmust pszihedelikus effektusok ltrehozsra gazdag ltvnyvilg megteremtsvel.

Milkdrop var upprunalega vibt vi Winamp tnlistarspilarann. egar hlustar tnlistina, fer Milkdrop me ig flug gegnum hljbylgjurnar sem heyrir og notar taktskynjun til a setja af sta allskonar effekta sem skapa myndrnt feralag gegnum tnlistarupplifunina

MilkDrop era, in origine, un "plug-in" di visualizzazione per Winamp. Mentre ascolti la musica, MilkDrop ti fa volare tra le onde sonore di ci che stai ascoltando usando la rilevazione del ritmo per sincronizzare una miriade di effetti psichedelici, creando un ricco viaggio visuale attraverso il suono.
MilkDrop Winamp
MilkDrop . .
MilkDrop vizualizacija, gauta is Winamp. Klausantis muzikos, MilkDrop nukelia jus i nuostabu skrydi virs debesu, naudojamas ritmo aptikimas, kuris sinchronizuoja muzikos vaizdo efektus.
MilkDrop Winamp music player. , MilkDrop , myriad , .

Milkdrop was oorspronkelijk een muziekvisualisatieplug-in voor de Winamp-muziekspeler. Terwijl u uw muziek beluistert vliegt Milkdrop u door de soundwaves die u op dat moment hoort. Op basis van de beat produceert het een veelvoud aan psychedelische effecten.

MilkDrop var originalt et visualiseringstillegg til musikkavspilleren Winamp. Mens du lytter til musikken din, tar MilkDrop deg med p en flytur gjennom de faktiske lydblgene du hrer. Visualiseringen oppdager takten i musikken og bruker denne for skape en rik, visuell ferd gjennom utallige, psykedeliske effekter.

MilkDrop jest wizualizacj pochodzc z odtwarzacza Winamp. W czasie suchania muzyki, MilkDrop zabiera uytkownika w niesamowity lot pomidzy aktualnie odtwarzanymi falami dwikowymi, uywajc detekcji beatu, ktra synchronizuje efekty wizualne z muzyk.

Originalmente, o MilkDrop era uma visualizao do leitor de msica Winamp. Ao ouvir a sua msica, o MilkDrop leva-o a voar pelas ondas sonoras que est a ouvir, detectando o ritmo da msica e desencadeando uma variedade de efeitos psicadlicos. Cria, assim, uma viagem inesquecvel pelo som.

MilkDrop era originalmente uma visualizao do reprodutor de msica Winamp. Ao ouvir a sua msica, o MilkDrop leva-o a voar nas ondas sonoras que est a ouvir, usando deteco de batida para desencadear uma mirade de efeitos psicodlicos. Cria, assim, uma viagem visual inesquecvel pelo som.

MilkDrop a fost original un modul de vizualizare pentru lectorul de muzic Winamp. n timp ce ascultai muzica, MilkDrop v face s zburai printre undele audio actuale pe care le auzii i folosete detecia btii pentru a activa miriada de efecte psihedelice, crend o cltorie vizual bogat printre sunete.

MilkDrop bol pvodne hudobnm vizualizanm rozrenm Winamp prehrvaa. Pri povan hudby s Vami MilkDrop let zvukovmi vlnami, ktor povate a pouitm detekcie rytmu spa nespoetn psychodelick efekty, a vytvra bohat vizulnu cestu zvukom.

MilkDrop je bila prvotno vizualizacija za predvajalnik Winamp. Ko posluate vao glasbo, vas MilkDrop popelje skozi dejansko valovanje, ki ga sliite, in uporablja zaznavanje ritma, kar omogoi psihedelini efekt in bogato vizualno izkunjo predvajanja glasbe.
Milkrop fillimisht ishte nj "plug-in" pr vizualizimin e muziks pr riprodhuesin Winamp. Ndrsa dgjon muzikn tnde, Milkdrop vizualizon valt q i dgjon dhe prdor zbulimin e tingullit pr efekte t ndryshme.

Milkdrop var ursprungligen ett visualiserarande ljudplug-in till Winamp. Medan du lyssnar p din musik s fr dig Milkdrop flygande genom de ljudvgor du hr och anvnder rytmavknning fr att ge dig psykedeliska effekter som skapar en mktig visuell resa via ljudet.

Spectrum is a Visualisation showing a rotating 3D Spectrum Analyzer rendered in that moves to the beat of the music creating a wave effect across the spectrum grid. It also has settings to adjust the spectrum bar height, Its speed, and how the bars are rendered (solid, points, wire frame) and is a nice light weight, low cpu useage visualisation that looks great
Spectrum 3D ( ). . , - solid, points, wire frame. , .

Spectrum s una visualitzaci que mostra un analitzador d'espectre giratori en 3D renderitzat amb que es mou al ritme de la msica creant un efecte d'ona al llarg de la graella de l'espectre. Tamb t opcions per ajustar l'alada de la barra de l'espectre, la seva velocitat, i com es renderitzen les barres (slid, punts, malla de filferro). Una visualitzaci que utilitza poca CPU i que s veu molt b.

Spectrum je vizualizace zobrazujc rotujc 3D spektrln analyztor rendrovan v , kter se pohybuje v rytmu hudby a vytv vlnov efekt nap spektrln mkou. Obsahuje tak nastaven pro pizpsoben vky sloupc spektra, rychlosti a zpsobu vykreslen (vyplnn, body, drtov model). Je to velmi lehk vizualizace s nzkou zat CPU, kter vypad skvle.

-spektrum er en visualisering, der viser en roterende 3D-spektrumanalysator renderet i DirectX, som bevger sig i takt til musikken og skaber en blgeeffekt p tvrs af spektrumfeltet. Den har ogs indstillinger til at justere spektrumliniens hjde, fart og hvordan den bliver renderet (fast, punkter, trdramme). Det er en letvgtsvisualisering med lavt CPU-forbrug, som ser godt ud.

Spectrum ist eine Visualisierung, die eine rotierende Spektrum Analyse in 3D zeigt. Die Visualisierung wird so gerendert, dass sie sich zum Takt der Musik bewegt und eine Welle ber das Spektrum Grid legt. Es lsst sich neben der Hhe, die Geschwindigkeit als auch die Art der Balken (durchgehend, Punkte, Drahtgeflecht) einstellen. Eine schne Visualisierung, die nur eine geringe CPU-Last erzeugt

Se puede ajustar la altura de las barras, su velocidad, y como son renderizadas (slido, puntos, malla). Es una visualizacin que utiliza poca CPU y muy agradable.

Tambin tiene configuraciones para ajustar la altura de la barra de espectro, su velocidad, y cmo las barras son renderizadas (slidas, puntos, malla de alambre) y es una buena visualizacin liviana, de poco uso de cpu que se ve genial.

Lisaks on olemas ka vimalus seadistada spektri krgust, selle kiirust ja kuidas ribasid renderdatakse (tahkis, punktid, srestik). Il propose divers paramtres pour ajuster la hauteur, la vitesse, et le rendu des barres du spectre (plein, points, fil de fer). Une visualisation lgre, peu gourmande en CPU et agrable regarder.

extension.description:
You can use this webinterface to control the Audio/Video Section of XBMC: play/pause/stop/skip, show artists/albums/movies/tv shows and play them or add them to the playlist. It's designed for use on PCs or laptops with a browser like FireFox which supports JavaScript.
Hint: You may need to clear your browser-cache before you open the new installed/updated webinterface in your browser. It is highly recommended that you use a browser capable of using web sockets. IE 9 is not one of them.

: XBMC - , , , ; , , , . , FireFox, JavaScript.
: XBMC Frodo : - FireFox - Chromium - Internet Explorer 9 , : Internet Explorer 6
: / . web sockets. Internet Explorer 9 .

Du kan bruge dette webinterface til at styre Lyd/Video delen af XBMC: afspil/pause/stop/spol, vis kunstnere/albummer/film/tv-serier og afspil dem eller fj dem til afspilningslisten. Det er designet til brug p PC'er eller brbare med en browser ssom Firefox som understtter JavaScript.
Minimumskrav: XBMC Frodo Testede Browsere: - FireFox - Chromium - Internet Explorer 9 Ikke understttet: Internet Explorer 6
Tip: Du skal muligvis rydde din browser-cache, fr du bner det installerede/opdaterede webinterface i din browser. Det anbefales at du anvender en browser, som kan hndtere web-sockets. IE 9 er ikke n af dem.

Mit diesem Webinterface laesst sich die Audio- und Video-Sektion von XBMC steuern: play/pause/stop/skip, sowie Anzeigen/Abspielen von Interpreten/Alben/Filmen/Serien. Es wurde fuer den Einsatz an einem PC oder Laptop mit einem JavaScript-faehigen Browser wie FireFox entwickelt.
Mindestvoraussetzung: XBMC Eden Getestete Browser: - FireFox - Chromium - Internet Explorer 9 Nicht unterstuetzt: Internet Explorer 6
Hinweis: Sie muessen Ihren Browser-Cache leeren bevor Sie das neu installierte/aktualisierte Webinterface in Ihrem Browser laden.

/ XBMC: ///, /// . FireFox JavaScript.
: XBMC Frodo : - FireFox - Chromium - Internet Explorer 9 : Internet Explorer 6
: . web sockets. IE 9 .

You can use this webinterface to control the Audio/Video Section of XBMC: play/pause/stop/skip, show artists/albums/movies/tv shows and play them or add them to the playlist. It's designed for use on PCs or laptops with a browser like FireFox which supports JavaScript.
Minimum requirements: XBMC Frodo Tested Browsers: - FireFox - Chromium - Internet Explorer 9 Not supported: Internet Explorer 6
Hint: You may need to clear your browser-cache before you open the new installed/updated webinterface in your browser. It is highly recommended that you use a browser capable of using web sockets. IE 9 is not one of them.

Puedes usar esta interfaz web para controlar la seccin de Audio/Vdeo de XBMC: reproducir/pausa/stop/omitir, mostrar artistas/lbumes/pelculas/series de TV y reproducirlas o agregarlas a la lista de reproduccin. Est diseado para ser usado en PCs o porttiles con un explorador como FireFox que soporte JavaScript. Requisitos mnimos: XBMC Frodo Exploradores probados: - FireFox - Chromium - Internet Explorer 9 No soportados: Internet Explorer 6 Ayuda: Quizs necesites limpiar el cache de tu explorador antes de abrir tu nueva instalacin/actualizacin de la interfaz web. Es altamente recomendable usar un explorador con capacidad de usar web sockets. IE 9 no es uno de ellos.

Cette interface web peut tre utilise pour contrler tout ce qui concerne l'audio et la vido dans XBMC: Lecture / Pause / Arrt / Suivant, affichage des artistes, albums, films et sries TV, avec la possibilit de les lire ou de les ajouter la liste de lecture. Elle est conue pour tre utiliss sur un ordinateur fixe ou portable l'aide d'un navigateur supportant le JavaScript comme Firefox.
Prrequis minimaux: XMBC Frodo Navigateurs tests: - Firefox - Chromium - Internet Explorer 9 Non supports: Internet Explorer 6
Conseil: Il sera peut-tre ncessaire de vider le cache du navigateur avant d'ouvrir l'interface nouvellement installe ou mise jour. Il est fortement recommand d'utiliser un navigateur qui utilise les Web Sockets. Internet Explorer 9 n'en fait pas partie.

Vous pouvez utiliser cette interface Web pour contrler les sections audio/vido de XBMC : lecture/pause/arrt/passer, afficher les artistes/albums/films/sries tl et les lire ou les ajouter la liste de lecture. Elle est conue pour tre utilise sur des PC et des portables avec un navigateur comme Firefox qui prend en charge JavaScript.
Exigences minimales : XBMC Frodo Navigateurs tests : - FireFox - Chromium - Internet Explorer 9 Non pris en charge : Internet Explorer 6
Conseil : vous pourriez avoir vider le cache de votre navigateur avant d'ouvrir l'interface Web nouvellement installe/mise jour dans votre navigateur. Il vous est fortement recommand d'utiliser un navigateur capable d'utiliser des connecteurs WebSocket. Ce n'est pas le cas d'IE 9.

Pode usar este interface web para controlar a Seccin de Son/Vdeo do XBMC: reproducir/pausar/deter/saltar, amosar artistas/lbums/filmes/series e reproducilos ou engadilos a listaxe de reproducin. Deseado para o seu uso nos PCs ou porttiles cun navegador coma FireFox que soporta JavaScript.
Requirimentos mnimos: XBMC Frodo Navegadores Probados: - FireFox - Chromium - Internet Explorer 9 Sen soporte: Internet Explorer 6
Suxestin: posible que tea de limpar a cach do navegador antes de abrir a nova interface web. moi recomendable usar un navegador que sexa compatible co uso de web sockets. IE 9 non un deses.

/ XBMC: ///, /// . JavaScript .
: XBMC Frodo : - FireFox - Chromium - Internet Explorer 9 : Internet Explorer 6
: . Web Sockets. IE 9 .

Moete koristiti ovo web suelje za upravljanje Glazbenim/Video odjeljkom XBMC-a: reproducirajte/pauzirajte/zaustavite/preskoite, prikaite izvoae/albume/filmove/tv serije i reproducirajte ih ili dodajte na popis izvoenja. Dizajnirano je za koritenje na osobnim ili prijenosnim raunalima sa web preglednikom Firefox koji podrava JavaScript.
Minimalni zahtjevi: XBMC Frodo Testirani web preglednici: - Firefox - Chromium - Internet Explorer 9 Nije podran: Internet Explorer 6
Napomena: Moda trebate oistiti predmemoriju web preglednika prije nego to otvorite novo instalirano/aurirano web suelje u vaem web pregledniku. Strogo je preporuljivo da koristite web preglednik sposoban koristiti web uloke. IE 9 nije jedan od njih.

Ezzel a webes kezelfellettel irnytani tudod az XBMC zene s vide lejtszst: indts/megllts/kihagys, listk megjelentse az eladkrl/albumokrl/filmekrl/tv sorozatokrl s ezek kivlasztsa vagy lejtszsi listhoz adsa. Arra lett tervezve, hogy PC-n vagy mobil eszkzn is hasznlhat legyen egy javascriptet tmogat bngsz segtsgvel. Minimum kvetelmnyek: XBMC Frodo Tesztelt bngszk: - Firefox - Chromium - Internet Explorer 9 Nem tmogatott: Internet Explorer 6 Tipp: Lehet hogy a bngsz ideiglenes fjljait trlni kell, mieltt az jonnan teleptett webes felletet hasznlod. Kifejezetten ajnlott, hogy websocket tmogatott bngszt hasznlj. Az IE 9 nem ilyen.

Puoi usare questa interfaccia web per controllare le sezioni Audio/Video di XBMC: play/pausa/stop/salta, mostra artisti/album/film/programmi tv, avviarli o aggiungerli alla playlist. E' disegnata per usare PC o laptop con un browser come FireFox che supporti JavaScript. Requisiti Minimi: XBMC Frodo Browser Testati: - FireFox - Chromium - Internet Explorer 9 Non supportati: Internet Explorer 6 Consiglio: Pu essere necessario pulire la cache del browser prima di aprire la nuova interfaccia web browser. E' altamente raccomandato l'utilizzo di un browser compatibile con i "web sockets". IE 9 non uno di questi.

XBMC / : ///, ///TV . Java PC ..
: XBMC Frodo : - - - 9 : 6
: . web socket . IE 9 web socket .

Je kunt deze webinterface gebruiken om de Audio/Video sectie van XBMC te besturen: afspelen/pauze/stop/overslaan, weergave artiest/albums/films/tv series en speel deze af of voeg deze toe aan een afspeellijst. Het is ontworpen voor gebruik op PC's of laptops met een browser als FireFox welke JavaScript ondersteund.
Minimum eisen: XBMC Frodo Geteste Browsers: - FireFox - Chromium - Internet Explorer 9 Niet ondersteund: Internet Explorer 6
Hint: Wellicht moet je de browser-cache leegmaken voordat je de nieuw genstalleerde of geupdate webinterface in je browser opent. Het is zeer aanbevolen dat je een browser gebruikt die sockets ondersteund. IE 9 behoort hier niet toe.

Ten Interfejs WWW pozwala kontrolowa wybr, dodawanie do kolejki i proces odtwarzania zasobw audio / wideo, a wszystko to przy pomocy wygodnego interfejsu prezentujcego zasoby multimedialne przy uyciu miniatur filmw, seriali tv, wykonawcw i albumw muzycznych. AWXi zosta zaprojektowany do uytkowania na komputerach osobistych lub notebookach w przegldarce obsugujcej JavaScript, takiej jak FireFox.
Minimalne wymagania: XBMC Eden Przetestowane przegldarki internetowe: - FireFox - Chrome - Internet Explorer 9 Nie obsugiwane: Internet Explorer 6
Wskazwka: Po instalacji / aktualizacji, przed uruchomieniem AWX moe by konieczne wyczyszczenie cache przegldarki.

Pode usar esta webinterface para controlar as seces udio/Vdeo do XBMC: reproduzir/pausar/parar/prximo, exibir artistas/lbuns/filmes/sries tv e reproduzir ou adicionar lista de reproduo. Est pronta para ser usada em PCs ou portteis com um navegador como o Firefox que suporte JavaScript
Requisitos mnimos: XBMC Frodo Navegadores Testados: - FireFox - Chromium - Internet Explorer 9 No suportado: Internet Explorer 6
Dica: Talvez precise de limpar a cache do seu navegador antes de abrir a webinterface recm-instalada ou actualizada. Sugerimos que utilize um navegador com capacidades de usar web sockets. O IE 9 no tem essa capacidade.

Voc pode usar esta interface web para controlar a seo de udio/vdeo do XBMC: reproduzir/pausar/parar/pular, mostrar artistas/lbuns/filmes/sries de TV e reproduzi-los ou adicion-los lista de reproduo. feita para ser usada em computadores com um navegador que suporta Javascript.
Requisitos mnimos: XBMC Frodo Navegadores testados: - Firefox - Chromium - Internet Explorer 9 No suportado: Internet Explorer 6
Dica: Voc pode ter que limpar o cache do seu navegador antes de abrir a nova interface web instalada/atualizada. altamente recomendado que voc utilize um navegador com suporte a web sockets. O IE 9 no um deles.

Toto webov rozhranie mete poui na ovldanie Audio/Video sekci XBMC: prehra/pozastavi/zastavi/preskoi, zobrazi umelcov/albumy/filmy/serily a prehra ich i prida do playlistu. Je navrhnut pre PC alebo laptop s prehliadaom ako FireFox s podporou JavaScript.
Minimlne poiadavky: XBMC Frodo Testovan prehliadae: - Firefox - Chromium - Internet Explorer 9 Nepodporovan: Internet Explorer 6
Tip: Me by potrebn vyisti medzi-pam prehliadaa pred pouitm novho/aktualizovanho webovho rozhrania. Je odporan poui prehliada, ktor je schopn pracova s web-socketmi - IE9 medzi ne nepatr.

Du kan anvnda detta webbgrnsnitt fr att kontrollera ljud/video-sektionen av XBMC: spela/pausa/stoppa/hoppa ver, visa artister/album/filmer/tv-serier och spela dem eller lgga till dom i spellistan. Det r designat att anvndas p PC eller brbara med en webblsare likt FireFox som stdjer JavaScript.
Minimum krav: XBMC Frodo Veriferade webblsare: - FireFox - Chromium - Internet Explorer 9 Inte stdda: Internet Explorer 6
Tips: Du kan behva rensa din webblsarbuffert fre du ppnar det nyinstallerade/uppdaterade webbgrnssnittet i din lsare. Det r rekommenderat att du anvnder en lsare som kan anvnda webbsockets. IE 9 r inte en av dessa.

extension.summary: A modern Web UI for your XBMC
extension.description: A modern Web UI for your XBMC. Browse your Music, Movies or TV Shows from the comfort of your own web browser. You can play media via XBMC or stream it in your browser. Works best with Chrome but plays well with most modern browsers. For more, see github.com/jez500/chorus
Intended to be used as a replacement for a remote control, Hax turns your phone, tablet or other device into a remote control with a simplified media library browser.
